SEARCH
Package photoalbum.gui.controller

Class NonAdminController

java.lang.Object
photoalbum.gui.controller.NonAdminController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogoutController, Navigatable
public class NonAdminController extends Object implements LogoutController, Navigatable
This class is the controller for the non-admin user interface of the photo album application. It handles operations such as opening, creating, renaming, and deleting albums, searching for albums by name, and logging out.
